header_text: Your best friend is organizing a birthday party for you at their home. They invited a lot of people who will all be there for you. When you think about all of the people coming, you feel excited.

elements.Text: Are you excited about having people there to celebrate your birthday?

elements.name: Your best friend is organizing a birthday party for you at their home. They invited a lot of people who will all be there for you. When you think about all of the people coming, you feel excited._Social Situations_comp_question
